StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSasvabTestData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @MepsID varchar(3), @SortOrder varchar(6) ) AS
IF(@SortOrder = 'SCHOOL') BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SCHOOL_CODE, SCHOOL_NAME, TEST_DATE FROM SCORES WHERE MEPS_ID = @MepsID ORDER BY SCHOOL_NAME END ELSE BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SCHOOL_CODE, SCHOOL_NAME, TEST_DATE FROM SCORES WHERE MEPS_ID = @MepsID ORDER BY TEST_DATE DESC END
